snippet: European shares dropped on Friday following disappointing company updates, although French stocks performed better after a poll eased anxieties over the impact on markets of the presidential election....

headline.main: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram

lead_paragraph: European shares dropped on Friday following disappointing company updates, although French stocks performed better after a poll eased anxieties over the impact on markets of the presidential election.
